name: C.T.D
description:
Today is September 30th, 2000 and we regret to report tragic suicide commited by mid age woman in New Orleans, Louisiana. Few days after killing herself she was found hung on the old lamp cable 8 feet above the ground. This brutal suicide took place while the family was away from home, probably at Thursday afternoon. Her family reports ghost activity happening close to midnight, such as the door closing by itself, but it can be draft or postmortem trauma imagination. Game inspired by P.T.

THIS GAME IS AN UNFINISHED PROJECT AND WILL RECEIVE SOME NEW CONTENT IN THE NEAR FUTURE.
